name: City Bike Poli
description:
City Bike Poli!!!!
Ride past traffic at top speed, dodge cars through the city streets, jump off some amazing stunt jumps. Enjoy the thrills and action of being the police, explore all the huge open world city all for free!
- Wide open world, explore the city!
- Ragdoll physics, crash your bike and see the rider fly off
- Realistic motorbike driving simulation controls
- Easy to play game control, choose from touch or tilt controls
- Hit top speeds with powerful nitro boosts
